value.title: Dynamic AI Agents enabling the great reboot of the BFSI industry

value.title: Say hi to Proteus, Amazon’s most advanced warehouse robot yet
value.excerpt: Amazon has unveiled its first fully autonomous mobile robot. While it looks very much like a robot vacuum, Proteus is designed for transportation not cleaning.

value.title: Adelaide City Council votes against purchasing facial recognition software for city security cameras
value.excerpt: Police have refused to speculate whether they would invest in facial recognition software after Adelaide City Council voted unanimously not to include the technology in new security cameras being installed across the CBD. Adelaide City Council is due to ...

value.title: Amazon Shows Off Its Latest Warehouse Automation: Fully Autonomous Robots, High-Tech Scanners And More
value.excerpt: Amazon will show off four new pieces of robotics technology, including fully autonomous robots and high-tech scanners, at its re:MARS event in Las Vegas.

value.title: Artificial intelligence technology can secure sites by scanning major venues for weapons

value.title: Accelerate your career with ML skills through the AWS Machine Learning Engineer Scholarship
value.excerpt: Amazon Web Services and Udacity are partnering to offer free services to educate developers of all skill levels on machine learning (ML) concepts with the AWS Machine Learning Engineer Scholarship program. The program offers free enrollment to the AWS Machine Learning Foundations course and 325 scholarships

value.title: Microsoft Restricts Its Facial Recognition Tools Citing The Need for 'Responsible AI'
value.excerpt: The tech releases a Responsible AI Standard document that lays out its goals toward equitable and trustworthy AI.

value.title: A new global standard for AI ethics
value.excerpt: From predicting what we want to see as we scroll through social media to helping us understand weather patterns to manage agriculture, AI is ubiquitous. AI algorithms can also be partially credited for the rapidity with which vaccines were developed to tackle COVID-19.

value.title: GitHub Copilot AI coding assistant is now generally available
value.excerpt: Copilot is available via subscription for commercial developers, free to students and maintainers of popular open source projects.

value.title: This Ukrainian deeptech startup has trained an AI to paint war art

value.title: Robots found to turn racist and sexist with flawed AI
value.excerpt: A robot operating with a popular Internet-based artificial intelligence system consistently gravitates to men over women, white people over people of color, and jumps to conclusions about peoples' jobs after a glance at their face.

value.title: Nvidia’s new AI magic turns 2D photos into 3D graphics
value.excerpt: After converting 2D images into 3D scenes, models, and videos, the company has turned its focus to editing. The GPU giant today unveiled a new AI method that transforms still photos into 3D objects that creators can alter with ease.

value.excerpt: Want to make sure your code is safe? Slim.AI helps you secure your containerized programs with its "Four S Approach" -- Software Bill of Materials (SBOM), signing, slimming, and sharing.

value.title: How Data-Driven Banking Can Transform The Financial Landscape
value.excerpt: While online banking has made customers expect top-notch services at hand regardless of time and location, embedded finance and open banking have set the bar even higher.

value.title: Using Artificial Intelligence To Improve Business Decisions
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence (AI) is to business what telescopes are to star gazing—an incredible technological boost that magnifies, clarifies and illuminates business decisions. AI-enabled technology drives everything from algorithms that filter spam emails to complex systems that can drive cars without human intervention.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Could Be About To Change Soccer Player Scouting
value.excerpt: Chelsea are among the clubs using a phone app based on AI to help them scout players. The app allows scouts to compare amateurs' ability with the benchmarks set by the clubs' own players.

value.title: Preventing Harmful AI Bias With Fairness Through Awareness
value.excerpt: Today, there are many AI solutions to automate business processes and decisions, but few provide meaningful explainability. While rife with potential, organizations must never lose sight of the “why” behind automated decisions and predictions.
